entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:04 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Leader Airport 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -17.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -20.5°C
Wind: SSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Fog dissipating. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
